name: Bench Press (Barbell)
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder width, lower to chest, and press up.

name: Incline Bench Press (Barbell)
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder width, lower to upper chest, and press up.

name: Decline Bench Press (Barbell)
instructions: Lie on a decline bench, grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder width, lower to lower chest, and press up.

name: Close Grip Bench Press (Barbell)
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the barbell at shoulder width or narrower, lower to chest, and press up.

name: Squat (Barbell)
instructions: Place barbell on upper back, feet shoulder width apart, squat down until thighs are parallel to the floor, then stand up.

name: Front Squat (Barbell)
instructions: Rest barbell on front delts with elbows high, squat down until thighs are parallel, then stand up.

name: Deadlift (Barbell)
instructions: Stand with feet hip width apart, hinge at hips, grip the bar, and lift by driving through the floor and extending hips.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Barbell)
instructions: Hold barbell at hip level, hinge at hips with slight knee bend, lower bar along legs until stretch is felt in hamstrings, then return.

name: Sumo Deadlift (Barbell)
instructions: Take a wide stance with toes pointed out, grip bar inside knees, and lift by driving through the floor.

name: Overhead Press (Barbell)
instructions: Stand with barbell at shoulder height, press overhead until arms are locked out, then lower back to shoulders.

name: Bent Over Row (Barbell)
instructions: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend, pull barbell to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades, then lower.

name: Pendlay Row (Barbell)
instructions: Hinge forward until torso is parallel to the floor, pull barbell from floor to lower chest explosively, then lower back to floor.

name: Barbell Curl (Barbell)
instructions: Stand with barbell at arm's length, curl the weight up by flexing elbows, then lower under control.

name: EZ Bar Curl (Barbell)
instructions: Grip the EZ bar on the angled portions, curl the weight up while keeping elbows stationary, then lower.

name: Skull Crusher (Barbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, hold barbell above chest with arms extended, lower to forehead by bending elbows, then extend back up.

name: Hip Thrust (Barbell)
instructions: Sit on the floor with upper back against a bench, roll barbell over hips, drive hips up squeezing glutes at the top.

name: Barbell Shrug (Barbell)
instructions: Hold barbell at arm's length, shrug shoulders straight up toward ears, hold briefly, then lower.

name: Barbell Lunge (Barbell)
instructions: Place barbell on upper back, step forward into a lunge until both knees are at 90 degrees, then push back to start.

name: Barbell Calf Raise (Barbell)
instructions: Place barbell on upper back, stand on a raised surface with heels hanging off, raise up on toes, then lower.

name: Rack Pull (Barbell)
instructions: Set barbell at knee height in a rack, grip the bar, and lift by extending hips and standing tall.

name: Barbell Good Morning (Barbell)
instructions: Place barbell on upper back, hinge at hips with slight knee bend until torso is near parallel, then return to standing.

name: Floor Press (Barbell)
instructions: Lie on the floor under a barbell, press the bar up from the rack, lower until triceps touch the floor, then press up.

name: Push Press (Barbell)
instructions: Hold barbell at shoulders, dip knees slightly, then explosively drive the bar overhead using leg drive.

name: Upright Row (Barbell)
instructions: Hold barbell with a narrow grip, pull the bar up along the body to chin height leading with elbows, then lower.

name: Barbell Reverse Curl (Barbell)
instructions: Grip barbell with palms facing down, curl the weight up keeping elbows stationary, then lower under control.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on a flat bench holding dumbbells at chest level, press up until arms are extended, then lower.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, press dumbbells from chest level to full extension overhead.

name: Decline Dumbbell Bench Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on a decline bench, press dumbbells from chest level to full extension, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Fly (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, hold dumbbells above chest with slight elbow bend, lower arms out to sides, then bring back together.

name: Incline Dumbbell Fly (Dumbbell)
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, hold dumbbells above with slight elbow bend, open arms wide, then bring back together.

name: Dumbbell Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at sides, curl weights up by flexing elbows, then lower under control.

name: Hammer Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other, curl up keeping neutral grip throughout, then lower.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit on an incline bench, let arms hang, curl dumbbells up with a supinated grip, then lower with full stretch.

name: Concentration Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit on a bench, brace elbow against inner thigh, curl dumbbell up focusing on peak contraction, then lower.

name: Lateral Raise (Dumbbell)
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at sides, raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor, then lower under control.

name: Front Raise (Dumbbell)
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells in front of thighs, raise one or both arms forward to shoulder height, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder height, press overhead until arms are extended, then lower.

name: Arnold Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Start with dumbbells in front at shoulder height palms facing you, rotate palms outward as you press overhead.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Fly (Dumbbell)
instructions: Bend forward at hips, hold dumbbells below chest, raise arms out to sides squeezing rear delts, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Place one hand and knee on a bench, row dumbbell to hip with the other arm, squeeze back, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Pullover (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands, lower behind head in an arc, then pull back over chest.

name: Dumbbell Tricep Extension (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands, lower behind head by bending elbows, then extend back up.

name: Dumbbell Kickback (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hinge forward, hold upper arm parallel to floor, extend forearm back until arm is straight, then return.

name: Goblet Squat (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold a dumbbell at chest level, squat down keeping torso upright until thighs are parallel, then stand up.

name: Dumbbell Lunge (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, step forward into a lunge until both knees are at 90 degrees, then push back to start.

name: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squat (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells, place rear foot on a bench, lower until front thigh is parallel to floor, then stand up.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells in front, hinge at hips with slight knee bend, lower along legs until stretch is felt, then return.

name: Dumbbell Step Up (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, step up onto a box or bench driving through the heel, then step down.

name: Dumbbell Calf Raise (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, stand on a raised surface with heels off the edge, raise up on toes, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Shrug (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, shrug shoulders straight up toward ears, hold briefly, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit with forearms on thighs palms up, curl the dumbbells up using only wrist movement, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Wrist Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit with forearms on thighs palms down, extend wrists upward curling the dumbbells, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Hip Thrust (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit with upper back against a bench, place a dumbbell on hips, drive hips up squeezing glutes, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Upright Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells in front of thighs, pull up along the body leading with elbows to chin height, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Chest Supported Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie face down on an incline bench, row dumbbells up to sides squeezing shoulder blades together, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Floor Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on the floor, press dumbbells up from chest level, lower until triceps touch the floor, then press up.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Lunge (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, step out to one side bending that knee while keeping the other leg straight, then return.

name: Dumbbell Skull Crusher (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, hold dumbbells above chest, lower toward forehead by bending elbows, then extend back up.

name: Renegade Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Start in push-up position on dumbbells, row one dumbbell to hip while stabilizing with the other arm, alternate.

name: Dumbbell Thruster (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulders, squat down, then drive up explosively pressing the dumbbells overhead.

name: Cable Fly (Cable)
instructions: Set pulleys to chest height, step forward, bring handles together in front of chest in a hugging motion.

name: Low Cable Fly (Cable)
instructions: Set pulleys to low position, step forward, bring handles together in an upward arc in front of chest.

name: High Cable Fly (Cable)
instructions: Set pulleys to high position, step forward, bring handles together in a downward arc in front of chest.

name: Cable Curl (Cable)
instructions: Stand facing the cable with low pulley, curl the handle up by flexing elbows, then lower under control.

name: Cable Hammer Curl (Cable)
instructions: Attach a rope to low pulley, curl up with neutral grip keeping elbows at sides, then lower.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown (Cable)
instructions: Face the cable machine with high pulley, push the bar or rope down by extending elbows, then return.

name: Cable Overhead Tricep Extension (Cable)
instructions: Face away from high pulley, hold rope behind head, extend arms overhead, then lower behind head.

name: Face Pull (Cable)
instructions: Set cable to face height, pull rope toward face separating hands and squeezing rear delts, then return.

name: Lat Pulldown (Cable)
instructions: Sit at lat pulldown machine, pull bar down to upper chest while squeezing lats, then return with control.

name: Close Grip Lat Pulldown (Cable)
instructions: Use a V-bar or close grip handle, pull down to upper chest, squeeze lats, then return with control.

name: Wide Grip Lat Pulldown (Cable)
instructions: Grip the bar wider than shoulder width, pull down to upper chest focusing on lat engagement, then return.

name: Straight Arm Pulldown (Cable)
instructions: Stand facing high pulley, keep arms straight, pull bar down to thighs by engaging lats, then return.

name: Seated Cable Row (Cable)
instructions: Sit at a cable row station, pull handle to lower chest squeezing shoulder blades together, then extend arms.

name: Cable Lateral Raise (Cable)
instructions: Stand beside a low pulley, raise the handle out to the side until arm is parallel to floor, then lower.

name: Cable Front Raise (Cable)
instructions: Stand facing away from a low pulley, raise the handle in front to shoulder height, then lower.

name: Cable Reverse Fly (Cable)
instructions: Stand between two cables set at shoulder height, pull handles outward and back squeezing rear delts, then return.

name: Cable Woodchop (Cable)
instructions: Set cable high, rotate torso diagonally downward across the body in a chopping motion, then return.

name: Cable Pallof Press (Cable)
instructions: Stand perpendicular to cable at chest height, press handle straight out in front resisting rotation, then return.

name: Cable Crunch (Cable)
instructions: Kneel facing high pulley, hold rope behind head, crunch down contracting abs, then return.

name: Cable Pull Through (Cable)
instructions: Face away from low pulley with rope between legs, hinge at hips, then thrust forward squeezing glutes.

name: Cable Kickback (Cable)
instructions: Attach ankle strap to low pulley, face the machine, kick leg back and up squeezing glute, then return.

name: Cable Hip Abduction (Cable)
instructions: Attach ankle strap to low pulley, stand sideways, move leg away from the machine, then return.

name: Cable Hip Adduction (Cable)
instructions: Attach ankle strap to low pulley, stand sideways, pull leg across body toward the machine, then return.

name: Cable Upright Row (Cable)
instructions: Stand facing low pulley, pull the bar up along the body to chin height leading with elbows, then lower.

name: Cable Bayesian Curl (Cable)
instructions: Face away from low pulley, arm extended behind, curl handle forward by flexing elbow, then lower.

name: Leg Press (Machine)
instructions: Sit in leg press, place feet shoulder width on the platform, lower the weight by bending knees, then press up.

name: Hack Squat (Machine)
instructions: Stand on hack squat platform with shoulders under pads, squat down, then press up.

name: Leg Extension (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine with pad on lower shins, extend legs until straight, then lower under control.

name: Leg Curl (Machine)
instructions: Lie face down on the machine, curl heels toward glutes, then lower under control.

name: Seated Leg Curl (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine, curl heels under the seat by flexing knees, then return to starting position.

name: Chest Press (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine, grip handles at chest level, press forward until arms are extended, then return.

name: Incline Chest Press (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the incline machine, press handles upward and forward until arms are extended, then return.

name: Pec Deck (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine, place arms against pads, bring arms together in front squeezing chest, then return.

name: Shoulder Press (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine, grip handles at shoulder height, press overhead until arms are extended, then lower.

name: Seated Row (Machine)
instructions: Sit at the machine, pull handles toward torso squeezing shoulder blades together, then extend arms.

name: Smith Machine Squat (Machine)
instructions: Place bar on upper back in smith machine, feet slightly forward, squat down until thighs are parallel, then stand.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press (Machine)
instructions: Lie on bench under smith machine bar, lower to chest, then press up along the fixed path.

name: Smith Machine Shoulder Press (Machine)
instructions: Sit under smith machine bar at shoulder height, press overhead along the fixed path, then lower.

name: Hip Abduction (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine with pads on outer thighs, push legs apart against resistance, then return.

name: Hip Adduction (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine with pads on inner thighs, squeeze legs together against resistance, then return.

name: Calf Raise (Machine)
instructions: Stand with shoulders under pads, raise up on toes as high as possible, hold briefly, then lower.

name: Seated Calf Raise (Machine)
instructions: Sit with pads on knees and balls of feet on platform, raise heels as high as possible, then lower.

name: Reverse Pec Deck (Machine)
instructions: Sit facing the machine, grip handles with arms extended, pull arms back squeezing rear delts, then return.

name: Assisted Pull Up (Machine)
instructions: Kneel on the assist pad, grip the bar overhead, pull yourself up until chin is over bar, then lower.

name: Assisted Dip (Machine)
instructions: Kneel on the assist pad, grip dip handles, lower body by bending elbows, then press back up.

name: Glute Ham Raise (Machine)
instructions: Secure feet in GHD, start with torso parallel to floor, lower body forward, then curl back up using hamstrings.

name: Chest Supported T-Bar Row (Machine)
instructions: Lie on the chest pad, grip handles, row weight up squeezing shoulder blades together, then lower.

name: Pendulum Squat (Machine)
instructions: Stand on the platform with shoulders under pads, squat down through the pendulum arc, then press up.

name: Belt Squat (Machine)
instructions: Attach belt around hips to the machine, stand on platform, squat down, then stand up.

name: Preacher Curl (Machine)
instructions: Sit at the machine, place upper arms on the pad, curl the handles up, then lower under control.

name: Pull Up
instructions: Hang from a bar with palms facing away, pull yourself up until chin is over the bar, then lower.

name: Chin Up
instructions: Hang from a bar with palms facing you, pull yourself up until chin is over the bar, then lower.

name: Wide Grip Pull Up
instructions: Hang from a bar with a wide overhand grip, pull yourself up until chin is over the bar, then lower.

name: Neutral Grip Pull Up
instructions: Hang from parallel handles with palms facing each other, pull yourself up until chin is over the bar, then lower.

name: Push Up
instructions: Start in plank position, lower chest to the floor by bending elbows, then push back up.

name: Wide Push Up
instructions: Perform push up with hands placed wider than shoulder width to emphasize chest engagement.

name: Diamond Push Up
instructions: Place hands together under chest forming a diamond shape, lower chest to hands, then push up.

name: Decline Push Up
instructions: Place feet on an elevated surface, hands on the floor, lower chest to floor, then push up.

name: Pike Push Up
instructions: Start in a pike position with hips high, lower head toward the floor by bending elbows, then push up.

name: Dip
instructions: Support yourself on parallel bars, lower body by bending elbows until upper arms are parallel to floor, then push up.

name: Bench Dip
instructions: Place hands on bench behind you, feet forward, lower body by bending elbows, then press back up.

name: Bodyweight Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder width apart, squat down until thighs are parallel to the floor, then stand up.

name: Pistol Squat
instructions: Stand on one leg, extend other leg forward, squat down on the standing leg as low as possible, then stand up.

name: Jump Squat
instructions: Perform a bodyweight squat, then explode upward into a jump, land softly, and repeat.

name: Walking Lunge
instructions: Step forward into a lunge, then bring the rear foot forward to step into the next lunge, alternating legs.

name: Reverse Lunge
instructions: Step backward into a lunge until both knees are at 90 degrees, then push off the rear foot to return.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Place rear foot on a bench, lower body until front thigh is parallel to the floor, then stand up.

name: Step Up
instructions: Step up onto a box or bench with one foot, drive through the heel to stand on top, then step down.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, drive hips up squeezing glutes at the top, then lower.

name: Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, extend one leg, drive hips up with the planted foot squeezing glutes, then lower.

name: Crunch
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, curl shoulders off the floor contracting abs, then lower.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee in a pedaling motion while extending the other leg.

name: Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on back with legs straight, raise legs to 90 degrees keeping them straight, then lower without touching the floor.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a bar, raise legs in front until parallel to the floor or higher, then lower under control.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from a bar, bring knees up toward chest, then lower under control.

name: Mountain Climber
instructions: Start in plank position, rapidly alternate driving knees toward chest in a running motion.

name: Burpee
instructions: From standing, drop to a push-up, perform a push-up, jump feet to hands, then jump up with arms overhead.

name: Muscle Up
instructions: Hang from a bar, explosively pull up and transition over the bar, then press up to full extension.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Lie under a bar set at waist height, grip the bar, pull chest to bar keeping body straight, then lower.

name: Superman
instructions: Lie face down, simultaneously raise arms and legs off the floor, hold briefly, then lower.

name: Bear Crawl
instructions: Start on all fours with knees slightly off the ground, crawl forward moving opposite hand and foot together.

name: Box Jump
instructions: Stand in front of a box, swing arms and jump onto the box landing softly with both feet, then step down.

name: Tuck Jump
instructions: Jump explosively upward, tuck knees to chest at the peak, land softly, and repeat.

name: Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on a raised surface with heels off the edge, raise up on toes as high as possible, then lower.

name: Single Leg Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on one foot on a raised surface, raise up on toes as high as possible, then lower.

name: Handstand Push Up
instructions: Kick up into a handstand against a wall, lower head toward the floor by bending elbows, then push back up.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
instructions: Kneel with feet secured, slowly lower torso forward under control using hamstrings, then pull back up.

name: Sissy Squat
instructions: Stand holding a support, lean back while bending knees and rising on toes, lower until deep stretch, then return.

name: Toes to Bar
instructions: Hang from a bar, swing legs up to touch the bar with your toes, then lower under control.

name: Running
instructions: Run at a steady pace on a treadmill or outdoors. Maintain good posture and consistent breathing.

name: Cycling
instructions: Ride a stationary bike or outdoor bicycle at a steady pace, maintaining consistent cadence.

name: Swimming
instructions: Swim laps using preferred stroke at a steady pace, focusing on technique and breathing.

name: Rowing (Machine)
instructions: Use the rowing machine with proper form: drive with legs, lean back slightly, pull handle to lower chest.

name: Elliptical
instructions: Use the elliptical machine at a steady pace, push and pull with arms for full body engagement.

name: Stair Climber
instructions: Use the stair climber machine at a steady pace, stepping with full foot on each step.

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Swing rope over head and jump with both feet or alternating feet, maintaining a consistent rhythm.

name: Walking
instructions: Walk at a brisk pace on a treadmill or outdoors, maintaining good posture.

name: Incline Walking
instructions: Walk on a treadmill set to a high incline, maintain upright posture without holding the handrails.

name: Sprinting
instructions: Run at maximum effort for short distances or intervals, with rest periods between sprints.

name: Battle Ropes
instructions: Hold the ends of heavy ropes, alternate whipping them up and down rapidly while maintaining a squat stance.

name: Assault Bike
instructions: Pedal the air bike while simultaneously pushing and pulling the arm handles for full body effort.

name: Ski Erg
instructions: Stand at the ski erg, pull handles down in a skiing motion, hinge at hips, then return to start.

name: Hiking
instructions: Walk at a steady pace on varied terrain, typically outdoors on trails with elevation changes.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold a straight body position on forearms and toes, keeping hips level and core engaged.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on one side, prop up on forearm, lift hips off the ground forming a straight line, and hold.

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Lean against a wall with knees bent at 90 degrees as if sitting in a chair, hold the position.

name: Dead Hang
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with arms fully extended, grip the bar and hold for as long as possible.

name: L-Sit
instructions: Support yourself on parallel bars or the floor, raise legs straight out in front forming an L shape, hold.

name: Hollow Body Hold
instructions: Lie on back, raise arms overhead and legs off the floor, press lower back into the ground, and hold.

name: Superman Hold
instructions: Lie face down, raise both arms and legs off the floor simultaneously, and hold the position.

name: Glute Bridge Hold
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent, drive hips up squeezing glutes, and hold at the top.

name: Copenhagen Plank
instructions: Lie on side with top leg on a bench, lift bottom leg and hips off the floor forming a straight line, and hold.

name: Handstand Hold
instructions: Kick up into a handstand against a wall or freestanding, hold the inverted position with arms locked out.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Hold heavy dumbbells or kettlebells at your sides, walk with upright posture for time or distance.

name: Overhead Carry
instructions: Press weight overhead with one or both arms, walk with upright posture for time or distance.

name: Suitcase Carry
instructions: Hold a heavy weight in one hand at your side, walk with upright posture resisting lateral lean.

name: Rack Carry
instructions: Hold weights in the front rack position at shoulder height, walk with upright posture for time or distance.

name: Static Lunge Hold
instructions: Step into a lunge position with both knees at 90 degrees, hold the bottom position.

name: Barbell Hack Squat (Barbell)
instructions: Hold barbell behind legs, squat down and stand up while keeping the bar close to the body.

name: Zercher Squat (Barbell)
instructions: Cradle the barbell in the crooks of your elbows, squat down until thighs are parallel, then stand up.

name: Incline Dumbbell Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, lie face down, row dumbbells up to sides, then lower under control.

name: Dumbbell Snatch (Dumbbell)
instructions: Start with dumbbell between feet, explosively pull it overhead in one motion by extending hips and arm.

name: Dumbbell Clean and Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Start with dumbbells at sides, clean to shoulders by explosively pulling upward, then press overhead.

name: Cable Crossover (Cable)
instructions: Stand between cable stations with pulleys at various heights, bring hands together in front in an arc.

name: Cable Shoulder Press (Cable)
instructions: Set cables at low position, grip handles at shoulders, press overhead until arms are extended, then lower.

name: V-Bar Pushdown (Cable)
instructions: Attach V-bar to high pulley, push down by extending elbows while keeping upper arms stationary, then return.

name: Single Arm Cable Row (Cable)
instructions: Use a single handle on a low cable, row toward hip with one arm while maintaining square hips, then return.

name: Cable External Rotation (Cable)
instructions: Stand sideways to cable at elbow height, keep elbow at side bent 90 degrees, rotate forearm outward, then return.

name: Reverse Grip Lat Pulldown (Cable)
instructions: Sit at lat pulldown, grip bar with palms facing you at shoulder width, pull to upper chest, then return.

name: T-Bar Row (Machine)
instructions: Straddle the T-bar, grip handles, row the weight up to chest squeezing back, then lower.

name: Lat Pulldown (Machine)
instructions: Sit at machine lat pulldown, grip handles, pull down to upper chest, then return with control.

name: Tricep Extension (Machine)
instructions: Sit at the machine, grip handles, extend arms by pressing down, then return under control.

name: Bicep Curl (Machine)
instructions: Sit at the machine, place upper arms on pad, curl handles up, then lower under control.

name: Ab Crunch (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine, grip handles, crunch forward contracting abs, then return under control.

name: Rotary Torso (Machine)
instructions: Sit in the machine, rotate torso against the resistance to one side, then return under control.

name: Prone Leg Curl (Machine)
instructions: Lie face down on the machine with pad above heels, curl legs up toward glutes, then lower.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit with knees bent and feet off the floor, lean back slightly, rotate torso side to side.

name: V-Up
instructions: Lie flat on back, simultaneously raise legs and torso to touch toes, forming a V shape, then lower.

name: Flutter Kick
instructions: Lie on back, raise legs slightly off the floor, alternate kicking up and down in a flutter motion.

name: Plank Shoulder Tap
instructions: Hold a push-up plank position, alternate tapping each shoulder with the opposite hand while keeping hips stable.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hold kettlebell with both hands, hinge at hips, swing the bell between legs and up to chest height using hip drive.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Lunge (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, step backward into a lunge until both knees are at 90 degrees, then push back to start.

name: Dumbbell Preacher Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit at preacher bench, place upper arm on pad, curl dumbbell up with full contraction, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Squeeze Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on bench, press dumbbells together squeezing them throughout the movement, press up and lower.

name: Power Clean (Barbell)
instructions: Start with barbell on the floor, explosively pull it up and catch it at shoulder height in a partial squat.

name: Snatch (Barbell)
instructions: Start with barbell on the floor with wide grip, explosively lift and catch overhead in a squat position.

name: Clean and Jerk (Barbell)
instructions: Clean barbell to shoulders, then jerk it overhead by dipping and driving with legs.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl (Barbell)
instructions: Sit with forearms on thighs palms up, curl the barbell up using only wrist movement, then lower.

name: Reverse Grip Bent Over Row (Barbell)
instructions: Hinge at hips, grip bar with palms facing up, row to lower chest, then lower under control.

name: Cable Bicep Curl (Cable)
instructions: Stand between two high pulleys, hold handles with arms outstretched, curl toward head, then extend.

name: Reverse Grip Cable Pushdown (Cable)
instructions: Face high pulley with palms up, push down by extending elbows while keeping upper arms stationary, then return.

name: Cable Shrug (Cable)
instructions: Stand holding cable handles at sides with low pulleys, shrug shoulders straight up, hold, then lower.

name: Spiderman Push Up
instructions: Perform a push-up while bringing one knee to the same-side elbow at the bottom, alternate sides.

name: Archer Push Up
instructions: Take a wide push-up position, lower toward one hand while extending the other arm out straight, alternate.

name: Skater Squat
instructions: Stand on one leg, extend the other behind you, squat down touching rear knee to the floor, then stand.

name: Plank Up Down
instructions: Start in forearm plank, press up to high plank one arm at a time, then return to forearm plank.

name: Single Leg Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell)
instructions: Stand on one leg holding a dumbbell, hinge at hips lowering the weight while raising the free leg behind, then return.

name: Dumbbell Walking Lunge (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, step forward into a lunge, then bring rear foot forward to next lunge.

name: Seated Dumbbell Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit on a bench holding dumbbells, curl weights up keeping elbows at sides, then lower under control.

name: Zottman Curl (Dumbbell)
instructions: Curl dumbbells up with palms facing you, rotate to palms down at the top, then lower with palms down.

name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Sit on a bench with back support, press dumbbells overhead from shoulder height until arms are extended.

name: Bench Supported Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Place non-working hand and knee on bench, row dumbbell to hip with other arm, then lower.

name: Dumbbell Sumo Squat (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hold one dumbbell between legs with wide stance and toes out, squat down, then stand up.

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row (Dumbbell)
instructions: Hinge forward with one hand braced on a bench, row dumbbell to hip, then lower under control.

name: Dumbbell Tate Press (Dumbbell)
instructions: Lie on bench holding dumbbells above chest, lower them to chest by bending elbows outward, then extend.
